texto1: suspender un evento o actividad planeada.
texto4: They had to call off the meeting due to the storm.

texto1: Interrumpir temporalmente una actividad.
texto4: The game was called off because of rain.

texto1: Usar el teléfono para hablar con alguien.
texto4: She decided to call up her friend to invite her to the party.

texto1: Convocar a alguien para el servicio militar.
texto4: He was called up to serve in the army.

texto1: Realizar o completar una tarea o acción.
texto4: The scientists carried out an important experiment.

texto1: Implementar o hacer cumplir una orden o plan.
texto4: The soldiers were ordered to carry out the mission.

texto1: Seguir con una actividad o proceso.
texto4: Despite the difficulties, they decided to carry on with the project.

texto1: Persistir en una acción o esfuerzo.
texto4: After the interruption, she carried on with her presentation.

texto1: Aparecer o presentarse inesperadamente.
texto4: A new issue has come up during the meeting.

texto1: Acercarse a alguien o a algún lugar.
texto4: She came up to me and asked for directions.

texto1: Moverse de dentro a fuera.
texto4: The cat came out from under the bed.

texto1: Ser lanzado o divulgado al público.
texto4: Her new book is coming out next month.

texto1: Encontrar una solución a un problema o misterio.
texto4: She managed to figure out the complex puzzle.

texto1: Descubrir información a través de la investigación o el pensamiento.
texto4: I need to figure out where the noise is coming from.

texto1: Entender algo después de pensarlo detenidamente.
texto4: It took him a while to figure out the instructions.

texto1: Considerar o tomar en cuenta algo o a alguien en un plan o cálculo.
texto4: Don't forget to figure in the cost of materials.

texto1: Anticipar o planear que algo suceda.
texto4: They figured on having more time to prepare.

texto1: Escapar de un lugar o situación.
texto4: The prisoner tried to run away but was caught by the guards.

texto1: Escaparse, especialmente de un hogar o lugar de confinamiento.
texto4: She decided to run away from home at a young age.
